snippet: A victim’s husband still wants to know why Daniel Ignacio, who was sentenced to 25 years to life in prison, started the fire in their building three years ago.
abstract: Judge Neil J Firetog of New York State Supreme Court in Brooklyn sentences Daniel Ignacio to 25 years to life in prison; Ignacio was convicted of second-degree murder and arson in connection with fire that swept through an overcrowded Brooklyn apartment building in 2010, killing five Guatemalan immigrants.
lead_paragraph: A victim’s husband still wants to know why Daniel Ignacio, who was sentenced to 25 years to life in prison, started the fire in their building three years ago.

headline.seo: Question Lingers as Man Is Sentenced in Fatal Brooklyn Fire
headline.main: Question Lingers as Man Is Sentenced in Fatal Fire
headline.print_headline: Question Lingers as Man Is Sentenced in Fatal Brooklyn Fire
